an7.83:1.1: Atha kho ayasma upali yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma upali bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.83:2.1: “Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
an7.83:2.3: ‘ime dhamma na ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti’ti;
an7.83:2.6: Ye ca kho tvam, upali, dhamme janeyyasi:
an7.83:2.7: ‘ime dhamma ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti’ti;
